item.description:
Dodgeball has been a social phenomenon since Ben Stiller's Dodgeball movie came out.  It's a great active event for people to meet, bond through team work, and share lots of good laughs.

Anyone can play, doesn't matter with your athletic ability. All levels are welcome! Put on some comfy clothes and your sexy socks (yes, you'll be playing in socks) for a super fun night at Dodgeball of Boston! Bring a bottle of water!  

http://www.dodgeballofboston.com/

Cost: $8/person

When: Saturday 4/7th @ 7:15pm, the games run until 10ish.

Optional Pre-game dinner at 5pm: Thai Moon, 663 Mass Ave, Arlington

And may be post-game drinks, TBD.

Please indicate in your RSVP if you'll join us for pregame dinner, otherwise, we'll just assume that you'll only come for dodgeball.

Alewife is 3 mins away, very convenient for our kind members to give people a ride, or you can take the bus there. Please indicate that on your RSVP if you need or can provide a ride. And please note where you are coming from or need a ride from. This will make it easier for members to offer you a ride.

Parking: They have about 15 spots available, can park on Broadway or at Foodmaster near by.

Cheers!

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Saturday Night Dodgeball & Pre-game Dinner (Optional)!
